text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
Mom's package will be arriving soon! 
It's got snacks, milk…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
And pictures of our doggies! 
They're a precious part of our 
family back on the ranch!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
They're really, really good doggies. I
really miss their affectionate lickies……

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
…… I really want you to 
meet them soon, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure they'll give you loving lickies
too! 'Cause you're my trainer♪
